thread.title: Briscoe Group prepares ground for ASX listing in enlarged holding including Kathmandu
thread.title_full: Briscoe Group prepares ground for ASX listing in enlarged holding including Kathmandu

title: Briscoe Group prepares ground for ASX listing in enlarged holding including Kathmandu
text:
Topix › Pacific Travel › Briscoe Group prepares ground for ASX... Briscoe Group prepares ground for ASX listing in enlarged holding including Kathmandu 42 min ago Read more: Sydney Morning Herald 
Briscoe Group managing director and major shareholder Rod Duke is seeking a listing on the ASX as part of his offer for Kathmandu. Retailer Briscoe Group, a household name in its native New Zealand, is embarking on a charm offensive to raise its profile in Australia ahead of a $324 million takeover of Kathmandu Holdings and listing on the Australian securities exchange. Start the conversation, or Read more at Sydney Morning Herald.
